headline: Halliburton Aims To Turn NEX Lab Technology Into Earnings And Growth
summary: Halliburton (NYSE:HAL) has launched the Next-Generation Energy Accelerators Joint Lab with Singapore's A*STAR. The collaboration is intended to advance well completion technologies and support low carbon and energy transition projects. The Singapore Economic Development Board is involved to help move new energy technologies from research toward commercial use. For investors watching Halliburton at a share price of $33.52, this new lab adds another piece to the story around technology driven...
